description: Dive into "Sun-Kissed Shores of Nha Trang" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sun-Kissed Shores of Nha Trang

places.generalDescription: Bãi biển Nha Trang is a stunning beach destination known for its long stretches of white sand and calm, inviting waters. The area offers a variety of beach resorts and recreational activities, making it an ideal spot for a relaxing getaway. While the main beach may not be the most picturesque, it boasts convenient amenities such as a boardwalk, gardens, playgrounds, and sports facilities.

sources.snippet: Nha Trang is home to several stunning soft white sand beaches offering everything from perfect sunbathing spots to plenty of recreational activities. The city's most popular beach is Tran Phu Beach, which attracts tons of tourists–this means lots of activity day and night, making the beach noisier but also full of amenities, including great restaurants and places to rent equipment for water sports. If you want peace and quiet, Bai Dai Beach might be a better option–it's full of locals, which means the beach and its surroundings aren't as well developed.
sources.shortName: 14 Top-Rated Tourist Attractions in Nha Trang

places.name: Bãi biển Nha Trang

reviews.text: Absolutely love this beach, it really gives Nha Trang its charm. Good for swimming but beware of the strong waves, plenty of sunbeds also available along the beach. I also came here for a run in the morning, love the scenery! ⛱️

After a rainy and disappointing few days in Da Nang, arriving in Nha Trang was exactly what we needed. The beach here is stunning-long stretches of clean white sand, crystal clear water, and a beautifully maintained promenade lined with tall palm trees and sculpted gardens. There are grassy areas with shaded benches, making it easy to relax and take in the views. The beach was lively but not overcrowded, and the atmosphere felt safe and welcoming. We saw families, couples, and locals all enjoying the space. It's the kind of place you could spend all day without realising. We'll absolutely return the next time we're in Vietnam.
One of the most developed and urbanized beaches I've been to! Despite being in a highly urbanized city, the beach is still beautiful and the sand looks great. I'll definitely go back!

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the stunning coastline, Sailing Club Nha Trang is a chic waterfront destination that seamlessly blends relaxation and vibrant nightlife. By day, it serves up an enticing array of Indian, Vietnamese, and Western dishes alongside refreshing cocktails. Guests can unwind on luxurious four-poster beds or beach deck chairs while soaking in breathtaking views of the East Sea.

sources.snippet: Two popular lounging spots are the Sailing Club and Louisiane Brewhouse. The former is also the spot for beach parties, with dancing on the sand when the sun goes down most nights of the week (especially Saturdays). If you head south of here, the beach gets quieter and it’s possible to find a quiet stretch of sand.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach | Nha Trang, Vietnam | Attractions

places.name: Sailing Club Nha Trang

reviews.text:
We came for sunset drinks on a Wednesday and it was perfect! Arrived around 5pm and was able to get a table with a nice beach view. We were having margaritas and gin and tonics and they were great. We did have some nibbles like French fries and a pizza - it was all OK! Not amazing but as expected and decent enough.

What made the night was the music (a DJ starts around 8:30pm) and our server, Vy Long, who was the sweetest, happiest, loveliest person. He was so much fun and made our night!

I visited at 8:40 PM.
I went because I bought a ticket and could choose one drink and watch the show. The ticket cost 200,000 dong.
I asked the staff for a seat where I could watch the show, and they guided me to a seat inside the beach.
They said it was at 9, but the show started at 10. However, the show was inside the restaurant, so I couldn't watch it. I found out that the staff didn't understand English and just guided me to an empty seat.
The show lasted about 10 minutes, and it was just a fire show that you can see from the street.
After the show, they played some exciting music and the customers danced together.
The absurd thing was that when I returned to my original beachside seat after watching the show, my drink had been taken away and other people had taken my seat.
If you like dancing, it might be better to just go to another club.
If you want to have a drink in a nice atmosphere on the beach, I recommend another restaurant nearby.
A nice and spacious place in front of a lovely beach with good decorations. But it will be hot in a summer day. At the weekend they hold mini music on the beach. Price is not cheap but fine.

places.address: 72 74 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 570000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Bải biển Dốc Lết, also known as Doc Let Beach, is a stunning coastal destination located 50km from Nha Trang city in Vietnam. This picturesque beach boasts soft white sand and gentle waves, making it perfect for swimming and sunbathing. The area is dotted with palm trees and offers a serene and tranquil atmosphere, ideal for relaxation. During the low season in November, visitors can enjoy the beach with fewer crowds, providing a sense of exclusivity.
places.name: Bải biển Dốc Lết

reviews.text:
Doc Let Beach, located approximately 49 kilometers north of Nha Trang in Khanh Hoa province, is a picturesque destination renowned for its pristine white sands and tranquil azure waters. The beach's gentle slope and calm waves make it particularly suitable for families with children.  ￼

Visitors often highlight the beach's serene atmosphere, which offers a peaceful retreat from the busier Nha Trang city center. The surrounding area provides a glimpse into local life, featuring street food vendors, morning markets, and massage shops, all at more affordable prices compared to other regions.  ￼

For those traveling from Nha Trang, reaching Doc Let Beach is convenient. Bus #3 operates regularly, transporting passengers directly to the beach in about an hour and a half. Upon arrival, amenities such as rentable beach chairs are available, and local vendors offer a variety of snacks, including the delightful tofu pudding with ginger caramel.  ￼

In summary, Doc Let Beach stands out as a must-visit destination for those seeking a blend of natural beauty and cultural immersion. Its combination of stunning scenery, clear and safe waters, and authentic local experiences make it a highlight of the Nha Trang region.

Is this the best beach ive been to? Yes absolutely. Serene and calm. The beach was comparatively empty and not many tourists come here. The sand was white and water blue. Its a 2 hours drive from nha trang and you can spend the whole day here. You can rent a bed and relax here all day.
Best beach in viet nam

places.generalDescription: Trần Phú Beach, located in Nha Trang, is a vibrant destination known for its leisure activities, sailing opportunities, bars, hotels, and spas. The area is bustling with attractions such as souvenir shops, museums, resorts, and restaurants along Tran Phu Street. Adventure seekers can indulge in cycling, surfing, and snorkeling at the beach. Accessible from various parts of Nha Trang, it's considered one of the best beaches in the area.

sources.snippet: The central beach of Nha Trang city spans 7km along Tran Phu Street, one of the liveliest streets in Nha Trang. As a result, this beach is always bustling and considered the main beach of Nha Trang. It was also listed among the top 99 most beautiful beaches in the world by National Geographic.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

places.name: Trần Phú

reviews.text:
So amazing, beautiful ,clean, near beach , food  omggggg cant explain more.
Love Vietnam so much
Very nice Avenue/Boulevard. Very developed.

This is the most beautiful road/ boulevard in Vietnam. You can easy working, enjoy the night, clean beach, as well as the night lifestyle. The most important is that you can do sport in the dedicated small route just near the sea. You can jogging/walking all time here.

places.generalDescription: Hon Tre Island, also known as Bamboo Island, is a vibrant destination in Nha Trang Bay offering a wide range of entertainment options. The island is home to Vinpearl Land Nha Trang, an expansive tourist attraction featuring a luxurious resort and a world-class amusement park. With its stunning location on one of the world's most beautiful bays, Hon Tre Beach boasts white sands and crystal-clear waters, providing visitors with the perfect setting for relaxation.

sources.snippet: Nestled in picturesque Nha Trang Bay, Hon Tre Island, spanning 32.5 square kilometers, stands out as a premier beach destination in Nha Trang. Its pristine white sandy beaches and clear turquoise waters create an ideal environment for sunbathing, swimming, and snorkeling. The island is renowned for premier  Vinpearl Nha Trangresorts, offering serene beachfront experiences, and VinWonders Nha Trang, featuring the world's largest floating bay with a diverse array of water sports and activities.
sources.shortName: The top 9 alluring beaches to visit 2024

sources.snippet: Hon Tre Beach is one of the biggest in Nha Trang, set on an island getaway easily accessible from the city. The white sands, bright teal waters, and tropical surroundings beg visitors to come to immerse themselves in this beautify, which emits relaxation from every corner. Also known as “Bamboo Island,” Hon Tre Island is home to the VinWonders Nha Trang amusement park, which offers guests something to do during their time in addition to hanging out at the beach.
sources.siteName: Uncover Vietnam Travel Guide | Vacations, Travel and Tourism
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches by Nha Trang, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Doc Let Beach is a hidden gem that you might not hear much about when researching Nha Trang travel, but in my opinion, it is one of the most beautiful beaches in Vietnam. Located in Ninh Hai Ward, Ninh Hoa Town, Khanh Hoa Province, this beach is approximately 50km north of Nha Trang city center. It boasts a long stretch of fine white sand, crystal-clear turquoise water, and exceptionally smooth sand.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Most Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang You Must Explore

sources.snippet: Also known as the Bamboo Island, Hon Tre Beach is an ideal destination to enjoy the beauty of an alluring undiscovered island without the disturbance of other tourists. While visiting Hon Tre Beach, you can witness the spectacular nature of the area with forests, mountains, and beaches. Close by Hon Tre Beach, you can visit other beaches close by such as the Gold Stream or the Chen Beach.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Nha Trang: Explore Paradise in Vietnam

sources.snippet: On Hon Tre (“Bamboo Island”), the Vinpearl Land amusement park offers a wonderful small beach with a view of the city, which is included in the price of entry and transportation to the island (600,000 VND - $26.1)). Hon Tre Beach is next to the waterpark, and while most visitors appear to be more interested in the slides than the beach, the powder white sand and free huts are not as busy.
sources.shortName: 15 Gorgeous Nha Trang Beaches for Remarkable Vacations

sources.snippet: Hon Noi has just become popular recently with the unique feature of double beach, in which the beach comprises two separate beaches connected by a long stretch of white sand. 25 km from the city, located on Yen Island, Hon Noi can be reached in 1 hour by boat. This place is not only unique in its geographical feature, it is also home to the largest population of swiftlets.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Nha Trang not to be missed

sources.snippet: Besides Hon Tre beach, Bai Tru is one of the most enchanting beaches in Nha Trang located on Hon Tre island. Known for its stunning sunset, Bai Tru is quiet enough for a tranquil and relaxing experience, but also close enough to the amusement park for more vibrant activities such as visiting the aquarium, shopping, and leisure in the water park.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Nha Trang you should not miss out

sources.snippet: Popularly known as Bamboo Island, Hon Tre is the largest among the beaches in Nha Trang. The festivals like Ba Chua Xu (February), Ong Nam Hai memorial festival (April), Ba Thuong Dong (September) and July full moon day are celebrated here. The Gold Stream, Chen Beach is the top beach, which will mesmerize you at first glance.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Magnificent Beaches in Nha Trang

sources.snippet: Located in the picturesque Nha Trang Bay, Hon Tre Island, 32.5 km2 in size, stands out as the top beach destination in Nha Trang. The pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise waters create an ideal environment for sunbathing, swimming, and scuba diving. Hon Tre is the largest and most beautiful island in Nha Trang Bay.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Nha Trang Vietnam

sources.snippet: Hon Tre is one of the largest islands in the area, which is the home to a variety of entertainment, resorts and spas. In addition to Vinpearl Land, there is many seaside and goft resorts for your stay in Nha Trang.
sources.shortName: Places to visit, beach activities and things to do

sources.snippet: Many of the package tours have trip to the most famous island such as Hon Tre, Hon Mieu and Hon Lao, which surely deserve your visit.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide
Top 10 Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

places.name: Hon Tre

reviews.text: This place is unexpectedly delightful to explore. It's reminiscent of strolling through Europe, but with a unique vibe. They even have an area that feels like a version of Disneyland. The cable car ride offers both fun and stunning views. You can take it one way and return by water taxi, or vice versa. With numerous restaurants and shops, the prices are pretty reasonable for a tourist destination. For racing enthusiasts, there's even a race track. During the day, it's quiet and not too crowded, so I highly recommend visiting in the evening. Don't miss out on this gem when you're in Nha Trang.

Hon Mun island. I booked my snorkling tour with turtle dive company. Less than 10 people and not in a group of china mainland people. Very satisfied with everything.the guide was very nice and friendly,also helpful. Water quality is beautiful,lots of underwater creatures to see. We jumped in 2 spots in one tour, they have bathroom on boat and it's Clean. My tour cane with lunch on boat. Simple dish but very delicious. Enough for everyone. I had a very great experience.
Very nice place, especially if you want to eat something local and enjoy great view at the same time.

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hon Mun Marine Protected Area is a haven for diving and snorkeling enthusiasts, encompassing Hòn Mun island and several other surrounding islands. Covering a vast area of land and water, it aims to preserve the rich marine ecosystems and coral diversity of South Vietnam. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced diver, there are opportunities to explore the diverse underwater world here. For those seeking an adrenaline rush, diving at Octopus Rock promises an exhilarating experience amidst natural surroundings.

sources.snippet: Lastly, not so much one of the best beaches, but one of the best snorkeling in Nha Trang can be found within Hon Mun Marine Protected Area. I went on a snorkeling tour during my stay and it was one of the best things I did in the city. The Hon Mun Marine Protected Area stretches out over 12,00 hectares of an official marine reserve.
sources.shortName: Best 8 Beaches In Nha Trang You NEED To Visit 2024

places.name: Hon Mun Marine Protected Area

reviews.text:
very pristine water on a pebble beach. check the waves before going. if high waves you won't get to see any fish and snorkeling will go waste.

usually people cover this island via tour agent (2-3 island trip). this is a must among all. regardless of the waves present or not, good beach.
Fun place for snorkeling, toilet is extremely smelly. Too many hard rocks on the beach, making it difficult to walk
The coral reefs were beautiful! The beach however was very rocky. Make sure you have water shoes with you!

places.address: 735 Nguyễn Tất Thành, Phước Đồng, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Bai Tranh Beach, located on Tri Nguyen Island in Nha Trang, is a popular destination for travelers seeking natural beauty and tranquility. The beach spans over 500 meters and offers untouched landscapes, white sand, and clear waters. It's a great spot for snorkeling and water sports with scenic mountain views. Despite being a public beach, it maintains a peaceful atmosphere away from the busier tourist areas. Visitors can also enjoy the Bai Tranh Beach Resort nearby.

sources.snippet: Bai Tranh Nha Trang is a beach on Hon Mieu, Nha Trang Bay, with a total length of 500m. This place has a very special landscape, which is the two banks are divided, one side is white sand, the other side is all gravel, surrounded by trees and majestic mountains. This difference has brought natural beauty, wildness, romance to Bai Tranh and turned this place into a Nha Trang tourist destination with strong attraction for visitors from all over.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Nha Trang Vietnam

places.name: Bai Tranh Beach

reviews.text: Sun bed awesome. The staff were friendly and professional, and we had a great time riding the jet ski. They were punctual and very reliable.

A beutiful island. With a lovely small sandy beach and another pebble beach.. Loads of places to sit away from the heat of the sun. With opportunities to buy fresh fruit and coffees and drinks... Sport facilities there as well paragliding. Speed boats. And the famous banana... 70000 dong for the boat ride. About £2.50.per person per trip... So all I all a good day out
.

All the motorized sports are way too close to the beach, accidents can happen easily and the water while is cleared but reeks of gasoline smell and noises from the jetskies.

They also charge 10K vnd for a bucket of fresh water to rinse off the salt water if you decide to swim at the beach. I don't mind paying for fresh water, but at least have a running shower or something. Paying and towing your own bucket of water into the changing room feels so 1950s...

Overall, nice beach, but all the negativities really doesn't make me wanna come back here again...

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Hon Chong Beach, located near the famed Hon Chong Promontory, is known for its unique rock formations and peaceful ambience. This beach offers a laid-back vibe, with calm waters ideal for swimming and relaxing. Visitors can explore the nearby promontory, which provides panoramic views of the sea and the coastline.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Nha Trang | Nha Trang Beach

places.name: Bãi Tắm Hòn Chồng

reviews.text: Nice beach but crowded. Parking is 5k for motorcycles and 50k to rent a sun-lounger with umbrella also included a towel. The sun-loungers are make a wood and come with a comfy thick pad. The water was a bit cold for me but it was late January. The water was clear but cloudy. The waves were small and the ocean was relatively calm. I relaxed and listen to music while watching everyone have fun. They also rent paddle boards and other toys. Highly recommended

Best beach I've been to in the Nha Trang area. Quite clean and without crowds when I was there (late morning to early afternoon). You could also hear less traffic noise than from the main beach in Nha Trang. The water was very shallow, super warm and without waves - it was just like sitting in a bathtub. There are some rocks and fish around, which makes it entertaining enough to go around with a snorkel mask. Perfect for kids.
There were no stands by the beach, but there are some sun loungers and plenty of cafés and restaurants across the street. If you're staying in central Nha Trang, it's definitely worth getting a Grab and go there instead of Nha Trang beach.

Overall, this beach is lovely. The sand is soft, the public bathrooms are clean, the lounge chairs are in good shape, and there's a pleasant family atmosphere with beautiful water. However, it's best to avoid buying food from the vendors that come by, as the quality tends to be low and unsatisfactory.

places.address: Phạm Văn Đồng, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Nha Trang Beach is a popular destination in the province, offering a relaxed and laid-back atmosphere. Visitors can enjoy the tranquil surroundings and find shade under the palm trees. It's an ideal spot for families to unwind and take in the natural beauty of the area.

sources.snippet: Nha Trang has a very wide selection of hotel rooms, from dorms to luxury suites. Most are within a block or two of the beach. During high season (July and August) prices increase and it can be tough to find a place to stay.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach | Nha Trang, Vietnam | Attractions

sources.snippet: The beauty of the poetic turquoise beach right in the heart of the bustling city makes Nha Trang beach special and popular among both the locals and tourists. Nha Trang beach runs about 7 kilometers long, forming a soft curve that embraces the city with an array of bars, restaurants, and hotels snaking alongside. Visiting the beach, visitors will immediately forget all about the hectic life, recharging themselves to enjoy life.
sources.shortName: The top 9 alluring beaches to visit 2024

sources.snippet: Due to its close distance and excellent reputation, Nha Trang Beach is one of the most visited beaches in the city. The white sand and blue waters shimmer from the bay, alluring tourists and locals to come to hang out on the shore for a day of relaxation or water activities. Many streets in Nha Trang lead to this beach, including Tran Phu Street, which is why this section of the coast is sometimes called “Tran Phu Beach.”.
sources.siteName: Uncover Vietnam Travel Guide | Vacations, Travel and Tourism
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches by Nha Trang, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Doc Let Beach is a hidden gem that you might not hear much about when researching Nha Trang travel, but in my opinion, it is one of the most beautiful beaches in Vietnam. Located in Ninh Hai Ward, Ninh Hoa Town, Khanh Hoa Province, this beach is approximately 50km north of Nha Trang city center. It boasts a long stretch of fine white sand, crystal-clear turquoise water, and exceptionally smooth sand.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Most Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang You Must Explore

sources.snippet: In Nha Trang, you won’t have to travel far to find a stunning beach because the city center is home to one that seems to embrace the bay. Along the 7 kilometre Tran Phu Street, which runs parallel to the city’s main beach, inhabitants have set up hotels, restaurants, and other establishments to cater to tourists. As a result, it is also one of Nha Trang’s busiest beaches.
sources.shortName: 11+ Best Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Located on the lively Tran Phu street, together with Tran Phu Beach, Nha Trang Beach is considered one of the most appealing Nha Trang beaches in the center of the city. Nha Trang Beach is famous for its perfect location. Many luxury hotels, resorts, and restaurants are located on the shoreline of the beach.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Nha Trang: Explore Paradise in Vietnam

sources.snippet: No doubt one of the most popular beaches in Nha Trang is Nha Trang Beach. This is right in the city center making it super accessible to those staying central by just being a short walk away. Nha Trang Beach stretches out 6 kilometers and runs alongside the city center.
sources.shortName: Best 8 Beaches In Nha Trang You NEED To Visit 2024

sources.snippet: Tucked away from the main tourist areas, Tru Beach is a hidden gem appreciated for its untouched beauty. You can reach the island by taking a cable car from Nha Trang city. The beach is very luxurious and exclusive, with fine sand, clear water and stunning views.
sources.shortName: Top 12 Best Beaches In Nha Trang For Indian Tourist In 2024

sources.snippet: Nha Trang beach is without a doubt one of the most popular beaches in Nha Trang. This is located in the heart of the city, making it a short walk away for anyone staying in the vicinity. The 6-kilometer-long Nha Trang Beach runs parallel to the city center.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches in Nha Trang Vietnam That You Shouldn't Miss Out

sources.snippet: Nha Trang Beach is the most famous beach in Vietnam for both blissful nature and the touristy enthusiastic atmosphere. It takes 1.5 hours to fly to Nha Trang from Hanoi, and a mere 35 minutes from Ho Chi Minh City.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide

places.name: Bãi biển Nha Trang

reviews.text:
Nice beach , my son love play sand very much but cannot swimming because red flag signal heavy high wave. And very good for my running , weather so nice.
My wife she so lovely lobster street food.

Nha Trang Beach, a true jewel of Vietnam's central coastline, has long been celebrated as one of the country's most beautiful seaside destinations. Nestled along the shores of Nha Trang Bay – ranked among the 29 most stunning bays in the world – it boasts an endless stretch of powdery white sand that curves gracefully around crystal-clear turquoise waters. At sunrise, the golden rays gently pour over the sea, casting shimmering reflections that sparkle like countless dancing gems upon the waves. The water here is so clear that one can easily see the soft ripples of sand beneath, and its gentle waves create a soothing rhythm that invites visitors to relax and unwind. The surrounding air is fresh and lightly scented with the ocean breeze, while the horizon blends seamlessly into the deep blue sky, forming a breathtaking panorama. Along the coastline, palm trees sway gracefully in the wind, adding a touch of tropical charm. Whether you are strolling barefoot on the warm sand, taking a refreshing swim, or simply sitting and watching the sunset paint the sky in shades of gold and crimson, Nha Trang Beach offers an experience of pure beauty and serenity – a perfect harmony between nature's elegance and peaceful escape.

Nice beach of white sand and clear water. Pretty windy in December January with a choppy sea. Difficult-impossible to swim.
The Bay shows a beautiful scenery.

places.address: 102 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Robinson Beach Nha Trang is renowned for its stunning beaches, particularly the Robinson Nha Trang Beach. It's a perfect destination to unwind and enjoy quality time with loved ones on its sandy shores and crystal-clear waters. This family-friendly attraction offers ample opportunities for swimming and provides a serene environment without being overly crowded. Visitors can also engage in activities such as kayaking and snorkeling to witness an abundance of marine life within the bay.

sources.snippet: Robinson Beach, situated on its namesake island southeast of Hon Tre Island in the Vinh Nguyen Strait, is a hidden gem waiting to be discovered. To reach this unique beach, visitors must travel approximately 10 kilometers by boat or canoe from Cau Da Port.
sources.shortName: The 10 Best Nha Trang Beaches and Guide for Tourists

places.name: Robinson Beach Nha Trang

reviews.text: This place is not overly crowded. There's kayak and lots of chairs on the beach for usage. Good place to relax and chill
Nice visit with GREAT lunch.  Very pleasant spot
Beautiful beach with short distance from city centre

places.address: Đảo Hòn Tre, Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Z Beach Nha Trang is a proud host of lively music events and vibrant beach parties. Nestled on a wooden deck, it offers refreshing drinks and creatively crafted cocktails with a coastal flair. The venue provides an open and relaxed atmosphere, ensuring a delightful and joyful experience for all visitors. Located at Complex 4 Seasons on Tran Phu in Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa, Z Beach operates from 10:00 PM to 3:00 AM.

sources.snippet: The central beach of Nha Trang city spans 7km along Tran Phu Street, one of the liveliest streets in Nha Trang. As a result, this beach is always bustling and considered the main beach of Nha Trang. It was also listed among the top 99 most beautiful beaches in the world by National Geographic.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

places.name: Z Beach Nha Trang

reviews.text: Great vibe, we came in at night there was a live dj and the music it was good. The drinks as well were very good and at great prices, they should add beer 0.0% without alcohol to their menu as could be any pregnant woman that still likes beer… The outside area has a great vibe and we really enjoyed this bit in here. I would like to add that their toilets are public at the beach but if the customers are using these should be a bit more cleaned idk they are filthy and smell really bad.

We went there at night, the atmosphere is nice, fewer people so it is nicer for me. There is a DJ as well, which lightens the mood. The food is nice and drinks are cheap. Nice to spend time with friends. With a nearby volleyball court for beach volley. If you want a peaceful place than sailing boat 😅

Good place to chill. During the day before it opens it is very calm. Lot of sand space and not much other constructions around, making it a great place to lay your towel on the public part, or to rent a deck chair for a quiet leisure time. Beautiful view on the islands in front.

places.address: 90 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hon Mieu, also known as Mieu Island, is a small island in Nha Trang Bay that can be reached by ferry from Cau Da port. The island is densely populated and offers pristine beaches and the opportunity to visit two popular tourist destinations: Tri Nguyen Aquarium and Bai Beach Gravel. Tri Nguyen Aquarium features over 100 species of marine life, including live corals, and is designed in the shape of a fossil ship covered in moss.

sources.snippet: On this island, there is Tri Nguyen Aquarium, a place to preserve and present to tourists the diverse and abundant marine species in Nha Trang.
sources.shortName: Places to visit, beach activities and things to do

sources.snippet: Many of the package tours have trip to the most famous island such as Hon Tre, Hon Mieu and Hon Lao, which surely deserve your visit.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide

places.name: Hon Mieu

reviews.text: Incredibly stunning. Highly recommend going for a snorkel
The most exciting part of coming to this island was a 5k boat ride to get here
Very beautiful scenery. Clear water and nice weather

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hòn Tằm, also known as Tam Island, is a stunning and lush island located about 7km to the east of Nha Trang City in Vietnam. It is considered one of the most beautiful islands in the Nha Trang Bay area. The island offers a variety of beach resorts with picturesque natural landscapes and green trees. Visitors can enjoy water sports such as diving, parasailing, banana boat rides, and motorboating along the well-developed beach area.

sources.snippet: Doc Let Beach is a hidden gem that you might not hear much about when researching Nha Trang travel, but in my opinion, it is one of the most beautiful beaches in Vietnam. Located in Ninh Hai Ward, Ninh Hoa Town, Khanh Hoa Province, this beach is approximately 50km north of Nha Trang city center. It boasts a long stretch of fine white sand, crystal-clear turquoise water, and exceptionally smooth sand.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Most Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang You Must Explore

sources.snippet: Hon Tam Beach is a beautiful stretch of sand located on an island just offshore from Nha Trang city. This beach is only accessible by boat, making it feel like a true hidden gem.Hon Tam Beach is well known for its clear turquoise waters and stunning coral reefs. These reefs are home to an abundance of colorful fish, making them a popular spot for snorkeling and scuba diving.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches in Nha Trang Vietnam That You Shouldn't Miss Out

sources.snippet: Hon Noi has just become popular recently with the unique feature of double beach, in which the beach comprises two separate beaches connected by a long stretch of white sand. 25 km from the city, located on Yen Island, Hon Noi can be reached in 1 hour by boat. This place is not only unique in its geographical feature, it is also home to the largest population of swiftlets.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Nha Trang not to be missed

sources.snippet: Hot air balloon ride used to be operated on Hon Tam island but was later moved to a new centernear Pham Van Dong Street. The hot air balloon rides are considered safe with standard protective net and handrails so you can perfectly rest you mind to enjoy the terrific panoramic view of the city and marvelous blue bay from height of 150 metres.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide

sources.snippet: One of the most stunning beaches in Nha Trang is Hon Tam Beach, which from a distance like a huge green dragonfly. There is a peaceful marine area and a moderate, chilly environment here that attracts many of vacationers. On Hon Tam island, there is also a 4-star resort, which is a perfect getaway for those who love the outdoors.
sources.shortName: 11+ Best Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Hon Tam has located 7km to the southeast of Nha Trang City and covers an area of over 100 hectares. Hon Tam Beach is known throughout the year for its wildness and pure natural beauty that’s why several international travel magazines rated it as one of the 29 most beautiful beaches in the world.
sources.shortName: 15 Gorgeous Nha Trang Beaches for Remarkable Vacations

sources.snippet: The central beach of Nha Trang city spans 7km along Tran Phu Street, one of the liveliest streets in Nha Trang. As a result, this beach is always bustling and considered the main beach of Nha Trang. It was also listed among the top 99 most beautiful beaches in the world by National Geographic.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Beautiful Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

sources.snippet: The beaches around Hon Tam Island are well worth visiting while checking out the best beaches in Nha Trang. This place has been voted as one of the most beautiful bays in the world and won plenty of awards. Here you will find beautiful beaches and beautiful wilderness.
sources.shortName: Best 8 Beaches In Nha Trang You NEED To Visit 2024

sources.snippet: Tucked away from the main tourist areas, Tru Beach is a hidden gem appreciated for its untouched beauty. You can reach the island by taking a cable car from Nha Trang city. The beach is very luxurious and exclusive, with fine sand, clear water and stunning views.
sources.shortName: Top 12 Best Beaches In Nha Trang For Indian Tourist In 2024

sources.snippet: If you want to both relax and participate in water activities when traveling to Nha Trang, you are advised to visit Hon Tam.
sources.shortName: Places to visit, beach activities and things to do
The best beaches in Nha Trang you should not miss out

places.name: Hòn Tằm

reviews.text: Family trip with my parents-first time for them to try diving and snorkeling, and my first time paragliding, all in such a cost-effective way! It was an amazing experience 🤗🤗🤗
Its very good exprience to stay in hon tam resort. Beautiful beach and swimming pool.

Wonderful destination for mud bath
Good food with stunning sea view
Good services

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Phu Dong Park is a charming amusement park located near the beach. It may not have an extensive array of attractions, but it's a lovely spot for leisurely strolls. The park offers a pleasant environment for walking and enjoying the surroundings. Visitors can also appreciate the beautiful beach, clear sea, and affordable umbrellas available for rent at 50 dong.

sources.snippet: But the most fanciful amusement park status sure belongs to Vinpearl Land – NhaTrang’s response to Disneyland. It is, to be exact, an entertainment complex including amusement park, restaurants and resorts but is most well-known for its amusement park. It offers adrenalin raising rides, world-class water park, world’s longest over-the-sea cable car and biggest wave pool in Southeast Asia.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide

places.name: Phu Dong Park

reviews.text: Large park with good variety of trees, bushes, flowers and plants. Also a nice area to do some basic exercising. Right next to the beach, it is large enough to cut the traffic noise from the main street on one side to the beach on the other side.

The park is located at Nha Trang beach. There are many trees planted inside, but they are not beautiful.
It is often used to organize events. Inside the park there is a stage with a roof.
No need to buy tickets.
The public toilet area is hard to find. The park does not have amusement parks.
This is a mid sized park by the beach and it's nice to walk around.

places.address: 100 Trần Phú, Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hòn Một, the smallest island in Khanh Hoa Province, is located 9 kilometers southeast of Nha Trang Center City. Known as the 'village island,' it offers a unique blend of natural beauty with its blue sea, vibrant mountains, and lush fruit gardens. The island is also renowned for its stunning coral reefs, comparable to those found in Hon Mun Island.

sources.snippet: Mot Island is a small island with less than one square kilometer and more than 200 inhabitants. On the island, there is also a very rich ecosystem, with coconut gardens, mango orchards and also many beautiful corals.
sources.shortName: Places to visit, beach activities and things to do

places.name: Hòn Một

reviews.text: If you are a fan of diving, this place can't be missed in your journey
Treasure Island, it wonderful island!
pleasant journey. I recommend ..

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Beach Nha Trang is a vibrant and energetic beach resort with a breathtaking setting, surrounded by hills and featuring a sweeping crescent beach. The shoreline has undergone significant improvements in recent years, boasting parks, sculpture gardens, and a lively promenade. Tran Phu Street runs parallel to the main beach and is lined with hotels, restaurants, and various amenities catering to tourists. Additionally, Hon Chong Nha Trang offers an ideal escape from daily life, particularly beautiful in December and May.

sources.snippet: Sao Bien Beach is a famous Nha Trang tourist area, only about 90km from the center of the coastal city, so if you are planning to go to Nha Trang, you can combine visiting one of the Nha Trang beaches with this impressive beauty. Sao Bien Beach impresses visitors with its clear blue water, wild and poetic natural scenery, and a series of interesting games and activities on the sea. When mentioning Binh Lap village, few people know that there is an ecological area here, isolated in Cam Ranh Bay, called Sao Bien.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Nha Trang Vietnam

sources.snippet: Few people are aware that Cam Ranh Bay’s Sao Beach in Nha Trang is a modest eco-tourism destination. Children can learn about beach activities here as well as activities that promote environmental conservation. Because of the flat surface, shallow sandbars, and wind protection of this beach, kids can play on it with great safety.
sources.shortName: 11+ Best Beaches in Nha Trang, Vietnam

places.name: Beach Nha Trang

reviews.text: The sun rise in the morning is very gorgeous
Not a bad spot but nothing is around really tho.

Safe and sound

Thank you for watching my review
And have a lovely day guy's 😊

places.address: 76Q4+88H, Phạm Văn Đồng, Ba Làng, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hon Mun is a picturesque island known for its snorkeling and diving opportunities, beautiful beaches, and unique black rock formations. The island's high-rise cliffs feature dangerous wattles forming caves and grottoes in the southeast, with stones as black as ebony. Hon Mun is also famous for being a nesting site for flocks of swallows that migrate to the area every year.

sources.snippet: This tiny island, located just offshore from Nha Trang Beach, is a world-renowned scuba diving destination. Hon Mun is home to an abundance of colorful corals and fish, making it a snorkeller's paradise.If you're not a fan of getting wet, there's still plenty to see on Hon Mun Island. The views from the top of the lighthouse are simply breathtaking, and there are several hiking trails that wind their way through the island's jungle interior.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches in Nha Trang Vietnam That You Shouldn't Miss Out

sources.snippet: Hon Noi has just become popular recently with the unique feature of double beach, in which the beach comprises two separate beaches connected by a long stretch of white sand. 25 km from the city, located on Yen Island, Hon Noi can be reached in 1 hour by boat. This place is not only unique in its geographical feature, it is also home to the largest population of swiftlets.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Nha Trang not to be missed

sources.snippet: Of all the islands dotting the waters around Nha Trang, none are more beautiful and full of things to discover than Hon Mun. The limestone cliffs, caves, and stunning black rocks cover the coastline, offering beautiful photo opportunities, as well as climbing and hiking. A slow stroll on the beach will also reveal ebony-black caves hiding in the rock.
sources.shortName: 14 Top-Rated Tourist Attractions in Nha Trang

sources.snippet: Hon Mun was assessed by WWF as having the most marine biodiversity in Vietnam with a total of 1,500 species and is a planning sea as well as a protected ocean area. Due to its special location that allowed Hon Mun to receive the current with rich nutrition from the equator, the various coral species flourish, resulting in the diversity of sea lives.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Nha Trang you should not miss out

sources.snippet: Hon Mun is the most picturesque and full of things to see and do of all Nha Trang beaches. The coastline is covered with limestone cliffs, caverns, and gorgeous black rocks, which provide beautiful photo opportunities as well as climbing and trekking options. Hon Mun's greatest attractions, on the other hand, are discovered underwater.
sources.shortName: 15 Gorgeous Nha Trang Beaches for Remarkable Vacations

sources.snippet: Hon Mun Island is considered one of the four most romantic islands in Vietnam. The island is called “Mun” (meaning “black” in Vietnamese) because of its black cliffs and many caves. Hon Mun Island has many coral reefs and rich marine life thanks to favorable climate conditions, located next to hot ocean currents from the equator.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches In Nha Trang Vietnam

sources.snippet: If you are seeking for a romantic island of Nha Trang, Hon Mun is the answer. This island attracts visitors not only by the beauty of natural landscapes but also by the variety of ecosystems. You will surprise because there are 2000 coral and marine species in the world and 1500 of them can be found in Hon Mun!
sources.shortName: Places to visit, beach activities and things to do

places.name: Hon Mun

reviews.text: We stopped here as part of the 4 Island tour in Nha Trang and this island was probably my favorite. The water was super warm and clear, and it was such a fun experience to go snorkeling. I did wish we saw more coral reefs and fishes though.
There are a lot of fish but not much variety. No snorkeling allowed so visibility is limited. You should wear special shoes when going into the water because there are many rocks.

Dont go here to dive or snorkel because, the corrals are all dead and it is a lots of nets and trash stuck in the dead corrals.
It was just a totally grey bottom.
All the way out to the island there was plastic trash floating all over.
It was all very sad to see!

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

sources.snippet: Located on the serene Hon Tre Island, Bãi tắm Tre is a hidden paradise promising tranquillity and stunning views. Accessible only by boat, this beach is an escape from the hustle of city life. The soft sands and crystal-clear waters make it a favourite for sunbathing, snorkelling, and swimming.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Nha Trang | Nha Trang Beach

places.address: Vĩnh Nguyên, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hòn Lao, also known as Monkey Island, is a resort island located about 10 km from Nha Trang. It is home to over 1,000 monkeys and offers beaches, snorkeling opportunities, and live animal shows. Visitors can reach the island through all-day boat trips or by private means. The region boasts calm waters, stunning ocean views, and a wide variety of delicious seafood. Tourists can enjoy walking alongside the playful monkeys and watching intriguing animal performances.

sources.snippet: Many of the package tours have trip to the most famous island such as Hon Tre, Hon Mieu and Hon Lao, which surely deserve your visit.
sources.shortName: Nha Trang Beach Guide

places.name: hòn Lao

reviews.text: A quite good place to get away from city hall, walk around and watch monkeys. Be careful with monkeys when eating outside. Not many things to do except swimming, seeing circus performed by dogs and monkeys, taking photos.

Good views from the boat. It takes 20 min to get to the island.
Once there they have monkeys tied up performing tricks. They race them on dogs, swimming pools and motor bikes. People bet on it and laugh. They are tied up the whole time.
You can see the unhappiness in the faces of the monkeys and dogs.
Do not fund this attraction. We spent 30min on the island. 150,000 dong P person
Small island, calm sea, have bungalows, lying back chairs. Restaurants with resonable price. Many animal shows, relevant to kids, very funny. Suitable for 1 day relax.
